main event: On July 23, 1967, two witnesses observed an unidentified flying object in Colorado Springs, Colorado.
interesting points: Witnesses described the object having a green light on one side and an unidentified object connecting two lights., The object emitted smoke and moved rapidly in different directions., The sighting lasted approximately 2 minutes and 30 seconds., Witnesses indicated the object was about 4 miles away and estimated its speed at 1000 mph., No photographs or physical evidence were documented.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object with lights and smoke
